Generation IV.Diamond: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to Vespiquen .
Generation IV.Pearl: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
Generation IV.Platinum: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen .
Generation IV.HeartGold: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.

Generation V.Black: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
Generation V.White: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
Generation V.Black 2: This Pokémon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.
Generation V.White 2: This Pokémon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.

Generation VI.X: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
Generation VI.Y: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

Generation VIII.Sword: The members of the trio spend all their time together. Each one has a slightly different taste in nectar.
Generation VIII.Shield: It ceaselessly gathers nectar from sunrise to sundown, all for the sake of Vespiquen and the swarm.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Three Pokémon joined to become one. It busily carries sweet nectar to Vespiquen.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: They collect and deliver honey to their colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: They swear fealty to a queen Pokémon and work diligently to gather nectar. Each swarm produces a different flavor of honey.

Generation IX.Scarlet: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.
Generation IX.Violet: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers nectar from flowers to please Vespiquen.
